turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good evening. Yeah, I'd like to place an order at the Starbucks on Kingman Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say old keaton mill road?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does that location have coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, they do, would you like me to add coconut milk for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me place that order, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have placed an order for a vente caramel macchiato with coconut milk and extra caramel to be picked up at the starbucks at old keaton mill road, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you very much. When will that be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
